channel.title: WarScape 317 ll new server ll friendly staff ll online 24-7
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i67.tinypic.com/66dphf.png[/img]
Hello to everybody and welcome to this brand new server called WarScape. This is an Economy server hosted 24/7, where you will be able to train ALL of your skills at a decent exp rate. PK or kill some of the many bosses of the server. WarScape will SOON have 3 game modes, Normal, Deadman and Ironman, which many special features for each of those.
In Need of Staff, Mods-Supports & Admin(one)
Client Download: http://dl.dropbox.com/s/w0er4ucjq4juk2b/Play%20WarScape.rar Forums: http://warscape.createaforum.com/index.php
Some of the unique features of the Server: -Ironman mode(SOON) -Deadman mode(SOON) -Great membership benefits -Completionist (with colour changing) and max cape -Tutorial island (Can be skipped) -Quests -Duel arena -Nightmare Zone -Level points -Factions -Prestiging -Amazing pking -Buy 100, sell 100 -All skills are trainable even with a new custom dungeon skill -Pk points and pk point store. -Titles -PK SKILL! -GAME FRAMES 377- 474- 483 - 508- 525 & 562! -DAMAGE 10X! -Dung! -CURCES -Proper item effects such as Spirit Shields, including all special attacks! -Gold scrolls -Craftable high-tier armor/weapons -Single players dungeons / 20+ man raids -Money vault -Achievements with even an achievement cape! -Bosses with unique attacks and special features -Boss slayer tasks and more!
[img]https://www.upload.ee/image/5727895/82a0ce5af9099855e7e9f4872ffa351d.png[/img] [img]https://www.upload.ee/image/5727897/b71d37a99efb03603562394fae9b1b41.png[/img] [img]https://www.upload.ee/image/5727902/smithing2.png[/img] [img]https://www.upload.ee/thumb/5727901/smithing.png[/img] [IMG]http://i64.tinypic.com/1puejl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i64.tinypic.com/178dcm.png[/img]

i was thinking it was simplicity at first then was like uhm? TrisidiaX?

                                                       Hello to everybody and welcome to this brand new server called WarScape. 
                                        This is an Economy server hosted 24/7, where you will be able to train ALL of your skills at a decent exp rate.
